summary: This module provides a Google Cloud Storage backend for Metaflow. It defines a storage class that implements the standard datastore interface, handling configuration lookup, metadata queries, existence checks, directory listings, and binary read/write operations. It also includes a picklable wrapper around GCS clients that anchors all blob interactions to a configured datastore root, facilitating serialization for parallel execution.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow pipelines to persist and retrieve workflow artifacts, logs, and other data in Google Cloud Storage in a reliable, configurable, and parallel‑execution‑friendly manner.
